content:
If anyone ever has doubts as to how welcoming and nice the Backdrop community is, just look at other open-source projects where requests are just closed without any explanation: https://github.com/lando/lando/issues/2914

Make it easier to write & submit guides 路 Issue #2914 路 lando/lando
As a person who likes to keep my computer clean of cruft, I use Lando so that I don't have to install/manage all the software and tools needed to develop locally. As a Lando user, I find ways t...

You opened an issue saying "hey, I'd like to help with this project. Could we make it a little eaiser" and reply was to simply close your issue within one hour without any explanation or redirection. Seems like a lost opportunity on their part.

Maybe they have too many people helping them already. ;-)

Sorta unrelated but: The generally good natured attitude of Backdrop is one of the things I appreciate the most. Even when things get heated I've seen people say "that was a little harsh, sorry..." which is just plain grown-up behavior. A little humility goes a long way to a healthy community that people want to join.
